Module info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student
Package info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student

Interface GroupQuery

All Superinterfaces:
StudentQuery
All Known Subinterfaces:
AdvancedQuery
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdvancedQueryTest, GroupQueryTest, StudentDB
public interface GroupQuery extends StudentQuery
Hard-version interface for Student homework of Java Advanced course.
Author:
Georgiy Korneev (kgeorgiy@kgeorgiy.info)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Group>
    getGroupsById(Collection<Student> students)
    Returns student groups, where groups are ordered by name, and students within a group are ordered by id.
    List<Group>
    getGroupsByName(Collection<Student> students)
    Returns student groups, where both groups and students within a group are ordered by name.
    GroupName
    getLargestGroup(Collection<Student> students)
    Returns group containing maximum number of students.
    GroupName
    getLargestGroupFirstName(Collection<Student> students)
    Returns group containing maximum number of students with distinct first names.

    Methods inherited from interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student.StudentQuery

    findStudentNamesByGroup, findStudentNamesByGroupList, findStudentsByFirstName, findStudentsByGroup, findStudentsByLastName, getDistinctFirstNames, getFirstNames, getFullNames, getGroups, getLastNames, getMaxStudentFirstName, sortStudentsById, sortStudentsByName

  • Method Details

    • getGroupsByName

      List<Group> getGroupsByName(Collection<Student> students)
      Returns student groups, where both groups and students within a group are ordered by name.

    • getGroupsById

      List<Group> getGroupsById(Collection<Student> students)
      Returns student groups, where groups are ordered by name, and students within a group are ordered by id.

    • getLargestGroup

      GroupName getLargestGroup(Collection<Student> students)
      Returns group containing maximum number of students. If there is more than one largest group, the one with the greatest name is returned.

    • getLargestGroupFirstName

      GroupName getLargestGroupFirstName(Collection<Student> students)
      Returns group containing maximum number of students with distinct first names. If there are more than one largest group, the one with the smallest name is returned.
